***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Wand                                                                         |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Wand of acid                                                                 |
| Icon | [![Wand of acid.png](/images/f/f8/Wand_of_acid.png)](/File:Wand_of_acid.png) |

|   |                                                         |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A magical device which throws a bolt of corrosive acid. |

A **wand of acid** shoots a [Corrosive Bolt](/Corrosive_Bolt "Corrosive Bolt"), a powerful, somewhat inaccurate bolt which inflicts [corrosion](/Corrosion "Corrosion") on its targets.

Players will deal `4d(5.5 + 10.5 * Evocations/20)` acid damage with this wand.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Players have a [to-hit](/To-hit "To-hit") of `10.6 + (3.5 * Evocations)/25`.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

Monsters will deal `3d(7 + (30 + HD)/12)` damage with this wand.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

It is [mutually exclusive](/Alternate_items "Alternate items") with the [wand of light](/Wand_of_light "Wand of light") and [wand of quicksilver](/Wand_of_quicksilver "Wand of quicksilver").

## Contents

- [1 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [1.1 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [2 History](#History)
- [3 References](#References)

## Strategy

Wands of acid apply the [Corrosion](/Corrosion "Corrosion") status, which lowers monster [AC](/AC "AC") significantly. This can provide a surprising boost to damage, especially against tough enemies like [orbs of fire](/Orbs_of_fire "Orbs of fire"), especially when using fast weapons like [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades").

These wands are also good as a backup attack. A Corrosive Bolt is effectively a level 6 spell, and with a few points into Evocations, as strong as one. Plus, only a few monsters resist acid.

### Tips & Tricks

- Corrosion on monsters doesn't stack.
- Beware of [Ijyb](/Ijyb "Ijyb"), the goblin with a wand (of acid). Bolt wands are easily the most dangerous wand for a D:3 or so character to face. Thankfully, wands of acid can only be fired at range 5.

## History

- Prior to [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), monsters dealt more damage with this wand. Also, the [wand of light](/Wand_of_light "Wand of light") and [wand of quicksilver](/Wand_of_quicksilver "Wand of quicksilver") weren't introduced yet, so acid was in 100% of games.
- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), bolts would have their range reduced by 1 for each target you hit.
- Prior to [0.21](/0.21 "0.21"), wands of acid could hold at most 15 charges.
- Wands of acid were added in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [zap-data.h:1391](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1391) (0.30.0)  
   Specifically, you'll deal `4d(13/4 + 3 * pow/20)` damage, for pow = `15 + 3.5 * Evocations` ([evoke.cc:177](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.0/crawl-ref/source/evoke.cc#L177) (0.30.0)). If you have the [MP-Powered Wands](/MP-Powered_Wands "MP-Powered Wands") mutation, then your "pow" gains a +33% boost.
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [zap-data.h:1392](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1392) (0.30.0)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [zap-data.h:1393](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1393) (0.30.0)
